description:
Play as a mischievous, trash-hoarding raccoon in Grabage – a 3D free-for-all multiplayer platformer. Roll and fling yourself through fun fantasy environments, racing against your friends to collect the most junk. Recycle your trash into beautiful furniture and decorate to your heart's content!

Winner of Falmouth Games Expo 2023 Industry and People's Choice awards!

name: SpiritSweeper
description:
Join teenager Reenie and their spirit companion Oose as you start your (soon to be) successful spiritsweeping business. Explore houses, clear away spirit mess and deck out your treehouse!

Explore houses and uncover the secrets of the people who live there! What will you discover?

Use your trusty spirit brushes to clean away spirit imprints and capture adorable spirits to fill out your bestiary! Clean a lot, or a little - it's up to you!

Customise your treehouse by buying items with your hard earned pocket money! Discover more items while cleaning to unlock them in the shop!

name: What The Floosh Game
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in "What The Floosh Game", a dynamic, action-packed game that will challenge your skills and reflexes! Navigate through a universe full of obstacles, collect precious coins, and challenge yourself in different difficulty levels. With vibrant graphics, intuitive controls, and an immersive soundtrack, each match will be a unique and electrifying experience.

name: Le pays d'Adibou
description: Here we go, on a journey to the Land of Adiboo! Explore the magical garden and grow some fruit and vegetables yourself, but also enjoy nature at the same time. You can of course bake a delicious cake with that beautiful fruit, but you can also choose to do crafts in Adiboo's house. Or just have fun in the wonder cave and the games paradise. You need a good dose of common sense, courage and a sense of adventure to complete the games successfully. Get ready for hours of exciting gaming fun with your favorite heroes!

name: Lekker Spelen: Origins
description:
Back to the past where it all began. Lekker Spelen: Origins tells the story about a dog and a rat who wake up in a laboratory with many questions. Who are they? Where are they? Where are the scientists? And how do they escape from this laboratory?

A Lekker Spelen game with puzzles, action, co-op, and more than 10 years of references to explain to your fellow player who has never seen Lekker Spelen even though you keep linking all their videos.

Pick up scrolls to gain access to 8 different kinds of Ninja Magic. Use them wisely, and they'll be the key to advancing through the game!

The game was later released on the PlayStation 2 as The Toys Room. It's the same game as the PlayStation version but adds a jigsaw puzzle mode and a pair matching mini game.

name: Super Mario & The Rainbow Stars
description: Super Mario and the Rainbow Stars is a project that aims to bring the unique traits of the Paper Mario and Mario & Luigi series into a fun 2D platformer. Explore 7 different chapters, discover new partners and unique worlds, and stop Starnox's evil plans! Features: New moves, cutscenes, 3D world map, tons of powerups, a 3 hp life system, partner system, original songs and more!

name: Chase H.Q. 2
description: This modern sequel to the classic chasing game by Taito carries a similar formula with modern graphics. You are a cop that can pick between three different indestructible cars to chase criminals down, smashing their vehicles until they can't budge another inch, gaining points in the process. As such, this is not a racing game, the timer only exists to provide a level of challenge to the game.

name: Drums of War
description:
In Drums of War you play the role of a hero-leader. As the campaigns unfold the size of your armies can increase by up to 16 varied units. By participating in battles, all of the units become more experienced while naturally getting stronger. Players have the ability to hire new recruits, buy potions and distribute artifacts obtained in battles between fights. Each unit can be outfitted with one artifact and two potions. In addition to common units the player's army can include up to three unique heroes.

Almost every environment object is interactive – one can chop down a tree, set it on fire, or even turn it into an ally using magic. Each unit has its own action points which can be spent for any action – movements, attacks, spells or active skills. The player can randomly move units during his turn.

The in-game campaign editor lets you create custom campaigns, as a series of linked battles, with story text and customized rewards. You can save these campaigns a single file in order to easily share them.

With each unit the player has to make important tactical and strategic decisions. There is no need to remember a great number of each units properties or make complicated calculations – the player should rely on their personal assessment of the current situation. For most of the actions only one mouse click is enough – directing your army is easy and comfortable!

name: Famicom Fighters
description:
Famicom Fighters is a fighting game where various characters throughout the Famicom's and NES's library duke it out with each other!

There's several battle formats: your traditional 1-on-1 fight, tag team battles or teams of 3. Not only can you do your standard versus matches, there's even your traditional arcade mode as well as a survival mode! You can even play with others online! Famicom Fighters also utilizes the original Famicom/NES controls, allowing you to even use a Famicom/NES controller!

However, the question remains as to why they're all together like this. What has brought them here? Who is running the tournament? Who knows...

Are you playing with power?

name: Mario Forever Remake
description: Mario Forever Remake, as the name may imply, is just a complete remake of the famous Buziol Games’ Super Mario Bros. fan game “Mario Forever“, although its main elements differ it from the original and it features more custom content. Mario Forever Remake contains a bunch of never-before-seen additional worlds, like my long-living Letter Worlds Series, or Crist’s Minus Worlds. The game is based on the original Mario Forever versions that are between 2.16 and 4.4, with some little features from 5.0 and 5.9.

name: Luigi Floating on an Egg Over the Sea
description: Enjoy a relaxing ride across the sea with all of your favorite friends.

name: A Koopa’s Revenge 2
description: A Koopa’s Revenge 2 is a Super Mario fan game set in a parallel universe where Bowser and company are the good guys, while Mario and his pals are pure evil. After defeating Mario and his cohorts in the first game, Koopa sets off to a distant land where a kidnapped Bowser is being held by a mysterious robed figure. Play as Koopa, Goomba, or Shy Guy on your quest to free Bowser and restore justice to the Koopa Kingdom.

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 4: Gunyip!
description: An unreleased 4th game in the Ty the Tasmanian Tiger series, which was cancelled around 2007 due to Krome Studios focusing their resources on developing ports for Star Wars: The Force Unleashed.

name: Teardown: Folkrace
description:
You’ve been invited to compete in the local folkrace. Can you successfully diversify your business ventures into the world of demolition racing?

Folkrace is a single-player campaign expansion that introduces a ton of new vehicles and a series of destructive racing game modes against computer-controlled opponents. Test your mettle on the track against rival drivers and expand your car collection as you win championships.

description: Eight Dragons 2 is a scrolling beat-'em-up where you, or you and up to 7 friends (local or online co-op), battle to liberate the city from gang rule.

Play against your friends on different maps with incredible unique characters and at the end of each match receive tickets and unlock unique skins!

name: Down In The Dungeon

name: Ghost Hunter
description:
Glenda loves ghosts but no one believes in them except her! Using her trusty shovel and lantern, dig up graves and search for new ghost friends. But be careful -- some graves are cursed!

This game was made for A GAME BY ITS COVER 2023.
The game was based on art created by Gabby DaRienzo.

name: The Way Home
description: One strange evening, our nameless protagonist finds himself on top of a hill--dead-- with little to no memories to go off of. All he knows is that his purpose is to go home.

name: Find Cats2

name: Kill/Cure: Beautiful Vice
description: Kill/Cure: Beautiful Vice is a Danganronpa fan game, which takes place its own universe with an original cast. The theme will be "Virtue vs Vice".

name: Winged
description: A platform game with map that unlocks books! And the books are part of the gameplay, because it is through them that the characters gain new "wings", a metaphor for the concept of "wings of the imagination" that books teach us. This game innovates by blending literature and games in a harmonious way.

name: Tamaghost Jump!I Can't Believe It's Not Exorcism!
description:
After months of insomnia, you've tried everything: every pill, herbal supplement, special diet, every snake oil on the market. Nothing has worked. At this point, you're pretty sure you're just possessed, but you need your sleep either way. And, finally, the exorcism candles you ordered from a sketchy website ages ago arrive at your doorstep! Now, it's time to have a chat with the ghosts haunting you and convince them to leave you alone. Can you succeed? Which ending will you get?

A short horror/comedy game, now with 4 encounters and 7 different endings!

Originally made in just under 3 hours for Trijam #152, with the theme "Leave me alone!". Takes about 5 minutes for a full playthrough. Built in Ren'Py.

name: Ghost Whisperer
description: Ghost Whisperer is brought to you by the marvelous Joss! Equipped with her trusted ghost interpreter, Joss travels across the country to hear what ghosts have on their minds and assist in settling their unfinished business. So if you have a ghost you'd like helped to the other side, give us a call!

name: Cakey's Twisted Bakery
description: It's bake or die at Cakey's Bakery, where human children are the secret ingredient to strange monsters' delicious pastries. Find the recipe for survival to escape the bakery and it's sweet and scary staff!

name: Photogeist
description:
Photogeist is currently undergoing a major refactor, with new code from the ground up. Expect a smoother, more reliable experience very soon!

Welcome to Wandering Pines, home of the world's largest pickle statue, four coffee shops, and the world record for the most hauntings in a single town. After many complaints from the townspeople, the Mayor of Wandering Pines began construction on the Belwich Estate, a place for ghosts to live so they don't bother the town's thoroughly spooked residents.

Clara, an intrepid young reporter, finds herself unconvinced that the ghosts are as creepy as everyone claims they are. She has made it her mission to prove to the town, nay the whole world, that Wandering Pines' ghost problem is not a problem at all.

Join Clara in her search for ghosts, friendship and adventure in Photogeist - COMING SOON

name: Candy Factory TD
description:
Build a candy factory to defend against waves of candy creatures!
A first-person tower defense factory building automation game.
Manage productions, build candy turrets, expand the island, and beat the waves!

name: The Lair of Nekro Neko
description:
Game made for Black and White Jam #8 (Theme: Loop)

In this game you are Salem, a cat trapped in a time loop that will only be undone when he defeats the Machiavellian sorcerer Nekro Neko and saves his friends. For this, Salem will need to face evil creatures that increase his time inside the loop.

The more time he has, the more he will be able to explore the village and get more equipment to face the necromancer cat, but he will have to be careful as his time inside the loop is reduced when being attacked.

even ghosts have office jobs and must answer emails..
such is death ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Solve puzzles, and help him remember what happened.

description: A mahjong game for the Aleck 64 arcade system. The arcade unit consisted of a row of lettered buttons that corresponded to mahjong tiles. This a 2-player variant of mahjong.

name: The Missing Trail
description:
Today's the day of the Annual Halloween Bonfire! But why is it so... quiet?

The Missing Trail is a short visual novel about community, communication, and Halloween! Follow Tom the ghost as he investigates the mystery of the missing forest trail with the help of his new monster friends! But be careful… there may be mischief afoot!

name: Spoonman: Ballad of a Bonehead
description:
It's a typical Wednesday. Your asshole of a boss wants you to go grab a crowbar so you can open the generator room before the hotel you work at goes up in flames. So you head down to the hardware store, but they're sold out. Then you step in some broken glass and cut your foot. Then a homeless dude tries to sell you a crappy robot suit. And THEN a necromancer mistakes you for one of her minions and you're stuck in her creepy witch's hut!

Yep, it's just a typical, crappy day on Pen Island...

Play in 4 different arenas, collect rare rewards, and dominate the Sanctuary!

Have fun playing, and take care of the jammers!

name: In The Dark 2
description:
A devastating virus threatens to cripple the Galactic Federations Chief Neural Core, threatening to put an end to intergalactic travel and turning a galaxy-spanning empire into mere island settlements - disconnected and alone.

Ikalo Pann, Captain of the Starship Leviathan, must track down the source of this virus and bring the unknown terrorists before the Federation to answer for their crimes. An encrypted message sent by a dead man offers a single thread to unwind the mystery. Within are galactic coordinates and a brief message: "Come find me, Pann..."

Join Ikalo as she solves hundreds of complex puzzles, explores planets for clues and uncovers a deep science fiction mystery.

name: A Ghost Party
description: Help the ghosts get to the party.

name: Traumatarium: Penitent
description:
A dungeon crawler inspired by the Fighting Fantasy books and Warhammer Quest 1995.

The followup to Traumatarium, Penitent aims to improve on the success of the original, while improving and expanding on almost all aspects. You have three distinct dungeons to overcome, all while managing scarce resources and making hard decisions on when to push on, or use a map to return to the safety of one of the few outposts found in those dark halls.

Traumatarium Penitent takes place well after the events of the original game. The kingdom's knights have broken into two factions: the Penitents, who swore to pay off their sins in defense of the kingdom, and the Ebon Legion, who aim to bring forth again the evil spirits that once haunted the land.

name: The Punisher
description:
Shooter game similar to Operation Wolf, based on Marvel comic hero, The Punisher.

Each level consists of a series of single screens in which The Punisher needs to kill all enemies. Shooting an innocent results in instant game over.

Stock and clean shelves, prevent thievery, satisfy customers, keep employees working their best and text your needy friend without your manager seeing! Lock in your time management skills in this fast-paced strategy game. Go through 7 shifts of restless retail work, and maybe you'll find yourself on the break room wall of fame.

description: Rotating Roads is a puzzle game that challenges players to connect paths and guide a character safely through the game.

name: Parking Expert!
description: Parking Expert promises an addictive and immersive experience that will have you vying for the title of ultimate parking expert.

name: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls
description: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

name: Star League Baseball
description: 1-2 player arcade baseball game.

name: Aunt Fatima
description:
Aunt Fatima is a horror game where you play the role of a kidnapped person by Aunt Fatima and her husband who found a way to escape from the house. Aunt Fatima and her husband kidnap people, force them to stream on the dark web, then kill them and sell their organs on the black market. You are the only one who managed to find a way to escape from the house.

To escape, you need to solve puzzles, collect items that will help you along the way, and find keys to unlock your way out. Aunt Fatima roams around the house, and if she sees you, she will chase you. Try to hide in cabinets to avoid her. Uncover the buried secrets of the house.

name: SM64 Coop Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Dondgynns Auv Ye Wyrdd
description: We found a USB stick disguised as an ivory brooch among the many chests of gaudy silks, leaking perfume bottles, and taxidermied macaws that belonged to my late aunt. On the stick was this unfinished game. I managed to convince my 12 thieving uncles that there's no money in game development, so they let me keep the dump of the data while they weathered the brooch to sell as an antique. I thought you all might get a kick out of it. Every summer on Indian Lake there's a new litter of raccoon pups, and swamp stinks to high heaven.

name: Huddam 2 Berzah
description: HÜDDAM 2 BERZAH It is a type of psychological horror blended with Turkish culture.single playercrosswordfearIt is a game in FPS style.You must progress and as the chapter passes, you will find yourself in new places and events..

name: Godzilla Kaiju Wars VR
description: This unattended VR motion attraction features five action packed levels of cinematic VR at a level of intensity and realism never seen before … anywhere. Godzilla Kaiju Wars VR is designed from the ground up to provide the most compelling experience while providing Raw Thrills’ trademark reliability and longevity. This highly interactive VR game boasts the Thrill-D NXT motion platform, patented force-feedback blasters, wind and vibration effects, 6 channel Earthshaker audio, and featuring the massive 2X65″ GigaScreen video displays – to suck in a never ending stream of players!

name: Farm Merge Valley
description: Farm Merge Valley is a casual farming game where you merge various animals and objects to upgrade them. Grow crops and add animals to your farm while expanding to exciting new lands. Discover the peaceful farm life you always dreamed of while reaping the rewards from various challenges.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Edition
description: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers", "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail".

name: Madoka Magica Magia Exedra
description: Characters from the hit anime series "Puella Magi Madoka Magica" come together! Featuring an all-new story setting and characters from the original ideas of Gekidan Inu Curry (Doroinu), experience the action alongside Magical Girl memories in this battle RPG!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail - Collector's Edition
description: The Collector’s Edition includes Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail, the in-game bonus items, Dawntrail Special Art Box, Expertly Crafted Viper Figure, Adventurer’s Cloth Map, the Unending Journey and Adventurer’s Pen Case.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Collector's Edition
description: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers", "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail". All in-game bonus items from the Collector’s Editions are included.

name: Supernatural Rules Suppress Ghosts
description: Can't let the zombies wake up the spell can suppress the waking zombie please observe the first scenario carefully when the environment changes, it means that zombies are about to wake up Using spells to suppress unawakened zombies is counterproductive hold on until all seven lights come on

name: Flowxie's Mission
description:
Play as Flowxie the Fairy, and defeat the monsters with your magic.
Prevent your fairy treasure from being stolen.

The game is arcade type, so it will end until you run out of life. Reach as many points as possible and get coins to spend in the store and get special stuff.

name: Cthulhu Mythos ADV The Isle Of Ubohoth
description: A horror dice roll adventure inspired by the Cthulhu Mythos. Much like in a tabletop RPG, "abilities," "luck," and "dice rolls" influence the story's progression. The protagonist is cursed on an island in the Seto Inland Sea. Investigate the island, uncover the mysteries, and break the curse!

name: Magia y Demonios
description:
Old-school isometric RPG game with some more modern concepts.

You must challenge the forces of evil by eliminating monsters in a world where evil expands. As evil increases, the difficulty of the game also increases.

name: Fleapit
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninjabread Man: Blades of Fury
description: An unreleased sequel to Ninjabread Man, which got cancelled following after Data Design Interactive got shut down.

name: Schoolboy Runaway
description: “You little rascal! Go study your lessons right now!” said the angry parents, grounding you. Try to outsmart them and find a way to have fun with your friends.

name: Pokémon: Cuerpo de Cristal
description: Pokemon Crystal fan remake with next-gen improvements

name: A Prelude to an Adventure
description:
Hey! If you got about 5-10 minutes, then come and help an adventurer to prepare for a mysterious trip to the Land of the White Elephants. A Prelude to an Adventure is a little interactive experience with light puzzle elements, tons of animations and catchy music. Have fun!

Originally made for LOWREZJAM 2020 and then updated for MAGS August 2020 and then updated again to current version.

name: Don't Drink the Pink
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Ice your Cool
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Worry, I'll Bring the Beer
description: Sin descripción

name: Hungry
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello! Taxi
description: Sin descripción

name: Quest for Camelot
description: The unreleased home console version of Quest For Camelot’s video game adaption, which got scrapped due to the film’s poor box office performance.

name: OneShot: The Pancake Episode
description: It's the 10th anniversary of OneShot, and Niko has decided to share their mama's pancake recipe with the world! Join them on a special interactive cooking lesson in OneShot Cafe, the coffee shop AU where nobody dies.

name: Karate Survivor
description: Become a martial arts master in this survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Use your fists, feet, and the environment to fight off relentless thugs. Master powerful combos, enhance your skills, and remember: everything around you is a weapon!

name: From The Mystery Zone
description: You find yourself in a pitch-dark world. Avoid dangerous events, restore memory, and escape from the “Mystery Zone”.

name: Exiler
description: Face demons and occult rituals in Exiler, a gripping horror quest adventure. Perform banishing rites by combining skills and improvised means, uncover eerie secrets, and save innocent souls in a race against time. Be the exorcist or die possessed.

name: EA Sports F1 2001
description: An unreleased Game Boy Color port of F1 2001, which did release on home consoles.

name: Ghosts 'n Goblins
description: A heavily stripped down version of the 1985 arcade platformer, with only two levels and no music.

name: Myths are 100% True
description: An absurd platformer where you play as Hlev; master of aggressive photography. In the long year of 20XY, a sudden boom of myths has given Hlev the opportunity to photograph all the myths he wants to make his web videos. Inspired by obscure stuff from the 2000's. Go find the secrets, bre.

name: Deltatraveler: Section 1
description: In Ruins (or, alternatively, Section 1) is the first section of Deltatraveler, taking place in Undertale's Ruins.

name: Deltatraveler: Section 2
description: Oh, Mother (or, alternatively, Section 2) is the second Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in Earthbound's world.

name: Junkfood 3: Wow Wow West
description: Junkfood 3 is an MBF21-compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Pacifist Paradise Discord Server which features 94 newly designed slaughter levels; This time, with a wild western theme! The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter (BFG spammy, high monster count maps) where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design and other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.

name: McDoomguy's Slaughterific Sample Platter
description: Welcome to McDoomguy's! What can I get you? You're not sure? Well then, might I interest you in our Slaughterific Sample Platter? It's our award-winning 42-course meal crafted by a selection of chefs, world-famous veterans and new tryouts alike. Oh ﻿right, you probably wanna know what the entire gimmick here was. Well, the ﻿participating chefs had a selection of 12 different design restrictions on offer, of which they had to use at least ﻿3﻿﻿.

name: Deltatraveler: Section 3
description: Forest (or, alternatively, Section 3) is the third Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in the world of GG!Underfell.

name: Spooky Pixel Hero
description: A chilling homage to retro gaming – Rediscover the magic of classic games and retro platformers with a terrifying twist. SPOOKY PIXEL HORROR combines the beloved aesthetics of vintage 2D pixel games with a deeply immersive horror narrative that will keep you on edge.

name: Doomium
description: DOOMIUM is a Community Project of megawad worth of short, explosive, and fun ﻿maps made by collective effort of 25 mappers, ranging from mini techbases to dimension-crossing temples and mysterious realms in search for the purest element of Doom.﻿

name: OverTrip
description: A skill-based third-person shooter, where the thrill of competition meets the world of skill-based token betting and the captivating integration of diverse NFT collections.

name: Elevator Action
description: A port of the arcade game of the same name, made by Sega for their SG-1000 console. Due to the system's limitations, the scrolling is more choppy and the game has less detailed graphics.

name: Helltown: Revival Update
description:
Get ready to experience the chilling horrors of Little Vale like never before! Helltown has been completely remastered with the Revival Update, featuring enhanced environments and animations, reimagined characters, new dialogues, and redesigned gameplay sections.

But that's not all! Not only have the soundscapes been improved, but the game also now features a spine-tingling soundtrack by none other than Ockeroid, composer of the fabulous Crow Country game!

New scares await you in this free update, but will you have the courage to face the terrors lurking in the shadows? Or be brave enough to play through the game's different endings? There's only one way to find out...

name: Eagle Summoner
description: An unreleased puzzle RPG similar to that of Puzzle Quest developed by Sensory Sweep Studios, which got cancelled due to the studios’ bankruptcy.

name: X10
description: X10 is a cancelled first person shooter game by Warthog Games, which would’ve been about a soldier following strict orders whilst exploring a planet with the same name.

name: Buciyo 5
description: Buciyo 5 is an unreleased game which would’ve had the player choose between 5 different robots, each with a different peculiarity: voice, eyes, nose, ears, and brain, each of which would have allowed different gameplay mechanics and approaches to the game’s levels

name: Omnimancer
description: Roguelite-style game in which you must explore an ancient tomb filled with dangers and practically infinite magic

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Season Pass 2
description:
Deepen your DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT experience by grabbing Season Pass 2 which includes 3 additional story arcs!

Season Pass 2 Bonus:
• Sea Monster Soup cooking item

name: Tides of Tethys
description:
Tides of Tethys is an immersive underwater roguelite simulation game centered around exploring and surviving the uncharted depths of an alien world, while building and maintaining modular outposts.

Players will lead expeditions of Knights into the unknown, in the hopes of rebuilding their long lost kingdom and unifying the houses of Tethys once again.

As they dive further into the Abyss, they will discover compelling new places, uncover lost technologies, and conquer a variety of dangers that lurk beneath the surface.

name: Natsuyasumi ga Machidooshii
description:
Childhood friends Kazamugi and Tsuyoshi, who have just started dating, spend exciting days together until summer vacation.

Developed by doujin circle "Bolze", in this game you play as the girl who has made it her goal to have sex over the summer holiday. She can accomplish this by either being passive or active at various points in the story.

name: Pit-Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Pit-Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Kowai Mono ni ha Futa wo Shiro
description:
Everyone is living covering up something. They pretend not to notice it."

A direct mail from a famous event planning company. It contained a notice of a summer ghost story event called "Hyakumonogatari" and a call for participants.
You, a horror and occult enthusiast, decided to go to the event by yourself.
There, you meet a childhood friend you haven't seen in 10 years and also your current best friend (?). You were happy to meet them so unexpectedly, however......
The lid of your memory is lifted as you are led through a "scary story. What will become of them, tossed about and confused by the past and the present?

name: Ice Man
description:
Ice Man by Coastal Amusements is a new videmption arcade game where players use mounted water cannons to blast the legions of zombies on the game screen.

Zombies are attacking so you must use your cannon to shoot water at the video screen and freeze them! With cute graphics and no blood, this is a game that is great for the whole family to enjoy. Power-ups like the “Super Sprayer” unlocks new abilities, such as an intense 12 stream water cannon for more stopping power! The cabinet has been designed to contain any splash effects, and even includes a special feature where an eerie mist rises from the lifelike grass in the bottom of the playfield. All of the water is filtered through a special ultra-violet (UV) system while splash guards on the side help keep water contained.

name: Tubby Toast
description: Sin descripción

name: Teletubbies: Sliding Down the Hill
description: Sin descripción

name: The Tubby Custard Bubble Game
description: Sin descripción

name: The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf: Woolly Eyes Gaiden
description: The romantic noir visual novel The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf returns to Kabukicho in this unhinged simul-quel. Me, Azami, and the whole ragtag gang rampage through five all-new short stories!

name: Youchien Gaiden: Kareinaru Casino Club - Double Draw
description:
In modern English a casino is a facility that houses and accommodates certain types of gambling activities. Casinos are most commonly built near or combined with hotels, restaurants, retail shopping, cruise ships and other tourist attractions. Some casinos are known for hosting live entertainment events, such as stand-up comedy, concerts, and sporting events. Use in the past, and modern use in other countries, does not necessarily involve gambling.

Customers gamble by playing games of chance, in some cases with an element of skill, such as craps, roulette, baccarat, blackjack, poker, and slot machines. Most games played have mathematically-determined odds that ensure the house has at all times an advantage over the players. This can be expressed more precisely by the notion of expected value, which is uniformly negative (from the player's perspective). This advantage is called the house edge. In games such as poker where players play against each other, the house takes a commission called the rake. Casinos sometimes give out complimentary items to gamblers.

Youchien Gaiden Kareinaru Casino Club - Double Draw is a gambling game that features Roulette, Baccarat, Blackjack, Gunshooting, Racing, etc.

name: Chronicle: Rewritten
description:
Chronicle: Rewritten is a recreation of Jagex's original collectable card game, Chronicle: Runescape Legends. The game was taken offline on the 6th of August 2018 and hasn't been accessible ever since. Until now!

This remake is built from the ground up with the goal of having this game playable until the end of time. As long as there is a download available somewhere, you will be able to play it!

name: Soul Park
description: Build an infernal fun park, judge your customers' sins and give them what they deserve: a HELL of an entertainment

name: Diamond Detective
description: Stop thief! Calling all detectives! The city of Gemopolis has fallen victim to a clever jewel thief. Private eyes have work to do in Diamond Detective.

name: The Man in the Fields
description: The Man in the Fields is a first person horror game based on a ritual of the same name. Once you summon The Man in the Fields, every door and item in your house will be opened. Close everything in time to prevent it from getting in.

name: SpongeBob Squarepants: Idea Sponge
description: This educational game gives kids an adventure with Spongebob Squarepants while teaching them mathematics, logic skills, creativity, life sciences, history and nautical trivia.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants Bubble Rush!
description: SpongeBob SquarePants Bubble Rush! is an Action game, developed and published by Big Fish Games, which was released in 2006.

name: Patchy Matchy
description:
Cowabunga! Get matchy with Patchy, a surfer dude out to win the waves.

Help Patchy break the raddest records by matching 4 sea creatures in a row to clear them from the ocean.

Start a combo with a match of 6, and then keep matching fast to score bonus points.

If you and Patchy can unlock all 17 achievements, you'll be the most mondo Big Kahuna the beach has ever seen!

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Justice For Eternity
description:
"December 20, 2027. That's the day my world fell out from under me - again."

Join Phoenix Wright in an alternative storyline taking place one year after his greatest failure. Once again, the Turnabout Terror has hung up his badge and hidden away from the world - but mistakes have a way of coming back to haunt you, and Phoenix Wright has made more than his share of mistakes.

name: Pixel Gun World
description: Pixel Gun World is a free multiplayer shooter. Play with your friends, classmates, fellow students and colleagues! Fight against other players in PvP mode and try to survive in the Arena mode! Buy and improve your armor and weapons! Become one of the best pro players of Pixel Gun World!

name: Hang Pilot
description: An arcade hang gliding racing game.

name: Shinobi
description: The Master System version adds a life gauge, changes some of the hostage rules and simplifies the visuals in order to run better on the hardware.

name: Total Extreme Wrestling IX
description: The 9th game of the wrestling booking sim franchise.

name: Spongebob Boo or Boom
description: A browser flash game where the player control SpongeBob, Patrick, Sandy, or Squidward to set plumsters in the neighborhood to blast away the Plank-O-Lanterns. Doing so turns the tiles into your character's color. Get the most candy points before the end of the level to win!

name: Minha Casa
description: Awakened in the middle of the night by her own anxiety, Robertha will have to face her own demons beyond her own home.

name: Drone Racing Genesis
description:
SEGA Amusements presents you with a brand-new entertainment concept with Drone Racing Genesis. A unique and thrilling racing experience for visitors at FEC’s and arcades. Drone Racing is a rapidly growing sport and a worldwide phenomenon.

The game play is fun and exciting! With the casual and core player in mind, this game is easy to grasp but hard to master. The four race locations are visually stunning and highly immersive. To get a podium finish players must race to the finish line, collect ‘battery charge’ to give their drone a boost and zoom past their rivals.

name: President's Choice
description: You are the newly elected president of the United States. Are you able to make the right decisions and to be reelected for a second term?

name: BloodBoarderz
description: Race to the finish line and satisfy your murderous wishes while you go down the bloody mountains dodging obstacles and slaying your enemies!

name: Toon Troops Strategy
description: Toon Troops Strategy, where strategic thinking meets cartoon mayhem! Engage in tactical battles, outwit your opponents, and lead your colorful cast of characters to victory in this charming adaptation of the classic capture the flag style game.

name: Melty Amethyst
description: The full-voiced otome vishual novel that adds colour to ordinary life.

name: Skinless The Horror Story Quest
description: In "Skinless The Horror Story Quest," journey through a nightmarish blend of reality and hallucination. Wake up in a haunting hospital, face your fears in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies, and confront the doctor behind the epidemic. Can you escape the darkness within and without?

name: Run Mr. Robo!
description: They kicked you out of the city and now you want REVENGE!! unlock costumes and kill all the mayor's henchmen in this fast top-down-shooter, but watch out! only 1 hit and you die (unless you equipped the shield of course)

name: Realize Me
description: Main character is a nerd who attends a vocational school, but aims at becoming a scenario writer. He wants a girlfriend, but is afraid to confess his feelings, so he becomes obsessed with game girls instead. One day he starts to play a trial version of a new game and manages to call the heroine to his room. She seems to have an ability to open the gate between the fictional and real world. She looks very friendly, but she's a heroine from a 18+ game, right?

name: Orbem Explore
description: A pixel art RPG game where you can walk around the fictional universe "Orbem" based on The Homonian Chronicle Hard Sci-Fi / Fantasy novel series written by Scott V. Adrian.

name: Astercys
description: Step into an alternate realm where you traverse through different dimensions, survive spinning battles, and indulge in plenty of pineapple!

name: Kakos
description:
An upcoming card game where you can duel the underground folk. Explore the caves.
Discover the hidden history. But you should NEVER break the rules!

name: Au Revoir
description: Use your investigative skills in this point-and-click adventure to retrieve human minds stored in synthetic brains in 2071. Immerse yourself in a retro-futuristic world with neon-noir graphics from the 90s, and uncover a conspiracy that will challenge everything you know.

name: Kevurah Horror Tale
description: In Kevurah, you drive through a forest where you must reach a funeral that you must organize, bringing the various objects you have in your car into the funeral. All this while something torments and pressures you about the funeral.

name: Touch of Madness
description:
Touch of Madness is a 2D survival horror with 1-bit art. The game is heavily inspired by genre classics, especially Resident Evil and Silent Hill.

Explore the scenarios looking for information and items. Manage your resources through your inventory and survive the horror while trying to uncover the mysteries of the main story.

name: Project Arrow
description: Project Arrow is a 2D platformer game with puzzle environment elements. The game follows the story of an archer cat attempting to find its way home in a strange and mysterious world.

name: Death by Hype
description:
Death by HYPE is a melee Boomer-Shooter focused on fast-paced combat. The game takes place in the middle of the HYPE virus pandemic, and you (as an essential worker) must attend your shift at the beloved restaurant chain KAFC (Karlos Frango Cozinha), to sustain the needs of never-ending HYPEhead shoppers. In an unfortunate-- but predictable turn of events, your coworker bites your hand, and with the imminent infection ready to take its toll, you decide to go out by fullfilling your lifelong dream: taking out your pent up frustration on all your HYPE-ified customers.

Punch, slice, and stab through the maze corridors of the mall. Enter the stores and find out what happened with the other employees and survive as long as you can in this arcade boomer-puncher experience.

name: La Patifferie
description:
Lead everyone's favorite gig worker Amal as they compete to become the chef's assistant at the notoriously prestigious bakery, La Patifferie.

Go head to head against a motley crew of rascals, scoundrels, and other ne'er-do-wells for the ultimate prize of… having a job. The chef bakes the cookies and you need to pack them. But La Patifferie is known for its meticulously packed sets:

For each set, you need to match 3 or more cookies that share at least 2 traits!

name: Miroh Jr.
description: A co-op arcade puzzle mash-up.

name: Winter Winds
description: Winter Winds is a grim fantasy RPG where you play as a mute, recently resurrected sadist with the mission to return the missing sun to the sky.

name: Beauty Jigsaw
description: "Beauty Jigsaw" is a beautiful girl puzzle game with exquisite picture. We recommend that you open this game at your leisure time, while brewing a cup of fragrant coffee, and then enjoy a relaxing puzzle time ^_^

name: Creepypasta Land MV Edition
description: Creepypasta Land MV Edition is the same old Creepypasta Land but with full new graphics, new items, new secrets, new battle system, new maps, extra stories and a lot of new secret stuff!!!

name: Day of Atonement
description: This game is a puzzle based on the Day of Atonement. The player is the High Priest and must complete all the duties for the Day of Atonement.

name: Gilded Gears
description: An action platformer where you are a robot who wakes up in a factory with crazy robots who are definitely not going to be friendly. Escape the factory by using and acquiring skills if you can!!!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Legendary Edition
description:
The Legendary Edition includes:
• Full game
• Season Pass (2 original episodes and a new story arc)
• Season Pass 2 (3 new story arcs)
• 2 Cooking Items that give your character temporary and permanent Stat boosts
• Tao Pai Pai Pillar

Relive the story of Goku and other Z Fighters in DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT! Beyond the epic battles, experience life in the DRAGON BALL Z world as you fight, fish, eat, and train with Goku, Gohan, Vegeta and others. Explore the new areas and adventures as you advance through the story and form powerful bonds with other heroes from the DRAGON BALL Z universe.

• Experience the story of DRAGON BALL Z from epic events to light-hearted side quests, including never-before-seen story moments that answer some burning questions of DRAGON BALL lore for the first time!

• Play through iconic DRAGON BALL Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles against the most iconic foes (Raditz, Frieza, Cell, etc.). Increase your power level through RPG mechanics and rise to the challenge!

• Don’t just fight as Z Fighters. Live like them! Fish, fly, eat, train, and battle your way through the DRAGON BALL Z sagas, making friends and building relationships with a massive cast of DRAGON BALL characters.

name: Hipatya in I wanna world
description: Dive into a challenging and exhilarating adventure with "Hipatya in I Wanna World"! Created for the popular streamer Hipatya, this game combines the intense platforming action of "I Wanna Be the Guy" with unique and creative levels designed to introduce newcomers to the thrilling world of precision platformers. Tailored for novices, "Hipatya in I Wanna World" offers a perfect balance of challenge and accessibility, ensuring a rewarding experience for all players.

name: Quest for Jesus
description:
In a pretend educational game about Jesus, you play as Jonas, a guy learning about how awesome Jesus is.

Find Jesus and save another soul, learn about the deadly sins and how to please your Creator.

Though somewhat exaggerated, the game is not made to offend people of any faith or lack thereof, but takes the topic rather lightheartedly. Beware: Even some valid points may occur!

name: Dream Warrior
description: Dream Warrior is a streamlined, retro RPG modeled after the 8-bit classics, but without the filler. Except in this game you are not a great hero. No, you are the town drunk.

name: CityInc
description: A browser-game influenced by AdVenture Capitalist. The developer wanted to learn angular.

name: Mario's Carnival Quest
description: Mario’s Carnival Quest is a mod of Mario Party Advance to give the game a more fitting title, with a few quality of life tweaks added on top!

name: The Goddess Robbery
description:
This game is a small adventure (point and click) with two scenes, it can be completed in a few minutes.

Robert Robie's passion is to steal artworks. This time he wants the famous Snake Goddess. Can you steal it?

name: Flow Fox
description: Flow Fox is a fast paced precision platformer game, with some foddian elements to it. You start outside and must run across the scenary to the entrance, where you then must climb across different terrains that will demand you to be fast, precise, and think!

name: Pokémon Weird Type Fun
description: Weird Type Fun is a simple rom hack with an even simpler concept: to have even series veterans be confused about type matchups. With 18 all new types and a completely reimagined pokédex to match, WTF makes the ever familiar Kanto a little bit less so.

name: My Dating Agency
description: Sin descripción

name: Phraze Craze
description: Attempt to guess the letters of the words for a given topic. A spinning wheel determines the points per letter guessed. Lose turns by incorrectly guessing letters or spinning "ZAP" or "ZILCH".

name: Puzznic
description: This version removes the adult content present in the original game.

name: The Brain's Brain Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ginger Shroom Journey
description: Jump into action in this addictive platformer where your goal is to collect as many coins as you can! Harness the power of mushrooms to find your way out. But beware! Traps and monsters lurk around every corner, ready to challenge your reflexes and strategy. How far can you push yourself?

name: Castaway Coconuts
description: FPS Stealth action game starring the Hanks. Eliminate pirates that have invaded the island and also happen to look like Tom Hanks.

name: OutRun
description:
MSX Port of "OutRun"

OutRun is a racing game that allows the player to race across varied terrain in a readily available Ferrari, over a series of short tracks.

Gameplay is viewed from just above and behind the car. The roads are full of sharp bends and hazards, contact with which can cause the car to roll and lose the player’s time. On each section of track there is a fork in the road, allowing the player to choose which direction he or she wishes to go in. The player has to to complete five track sections in total, out of the fifteen in the game.

name: OutRun

name: OutRun
description:
Mega Drive/Genesis Port of "OutRun".

Barrel down the straightaway and bank your way into turns as you master the world's most challenging raceway. Race at top speed towards the finish line. Enjoy such realistic features as acceleration, lane changes, diversified terrain, sudden curves, and much more. Outrun is not just a test of who can drive the fastest, it's also a matter of who can plan the best race strategy and execute it flawlessly. Each race is different and demands a new strategy.

description: GBA Port of "OutRun".

description:
A Fantasy MMORPG Game (earlier version is NW2Online). There have 4 type of characters: Warrior, Shaman, Assassin, Ezra
There are 2 kingdoms: Selakim and Quila

description: You are a repair droid that has to maintenance the last remaining nuclear power station erected on the moon which provides Earth with energy. You race against time as a new storm approaches...

description: You control a landing raft on D-Day in the Normandy in France during WWII.

description: A small little game where your friends and you have a once in a lifetime opportunity: Hunt BigFool. BigFool is an elusive, fearsome creature of the night from unknown origins. Explore the Crimblr Forest and various points of interest, keep an eye and an ear out, and take down this iconic beast.

name: Vyanka's Memories
description: Vyanka's Memories is a platform-style game with metroidvania elements. Vyanka is a monster hunter who was called to her home village to protect it from a vampire. In the confrontation, she loses all her memories and powers and must remember them by defeating monsters in different biomes.

name: Gaggi Clicker
description: Welcome to Gaggi Clicker, the ultimate click-and-collect game! Immerse yourself in the world of "Gaggis" – enchanting little creatures just waiting to be collected by you.

description: Rogue Jungle is an Action-Roguelike, where you have to fight & explore your way through a procedurally generated jungle. Find new weapons on your journey and face a Boss Enemy at the end of each run!

name: Spitfire: Moonpies Mission
description: Spitfire – Moonpie’s Mission is a side-scrolling rail shooter musical adventure with a handcrafted world, a musical vibe, and a focus on boss battles inspired by the action hero cartoons of the '90s.

Freeware grappling hook game released by QPIC in 2014.
It is a predecessor to New Super Hook Girl.

name: Train Sim World 4: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa Route Add-On
description: Experience complex operations out of the iconic Dresden Hbf, with passengers and freight converging to make a hustle and bustle mix of traffic. Be in control of modern traction and explore the countryside of Train Sim World 4: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa.

name: Norm of the North: Arctic Dash
description:
It's off to the Arctic races in this multiplayer side-scrolling racing game! Play as the beloved polar bear Norm, or any number of characters from the animated film. Race against other players and do whatever it takes to cross the finish line first! But be careful...the other players will be out to get you with Bottle Rockets, Frosty Icicles, Sea Mines, and other nasty projectiles!

Play with other people online or host your own game with friends and battle for first place!

name: Super Hook Girl Gaiden: For Smile Giving Birthday
description:
This is a freeware adventure game released by QPIC in 2017.
It is a spin-off of New Super Hook Girl, and it depicts the protagonist's past.

In-game time progresses as the player performs certain actions, which change the conversation with NPCs, the state of the field, and other aspects of the game.

name: PGA Tour 2K23: Style & Swing Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Sumo Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Football Referee Simulator
description: Football Referee Simulator—the groundbreaking mobile game that puts you in the referee's shoes! Are you ready to kickstart your career in the lower divisions and ascend to legendary status by overseeing thrilling finals?

name: To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora
description: Inspired by strategy RPG classics, To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora is a roguelite tactical RPG where you lead a customizable squad in turn-based combat, navigating dynamic paths, battling mythical creatures, and discovering epic loot in a pixel art medieval fantasy world.

name: Old Coin Pusher Friends 3
description: In this installment, there is a Sugoroku themed around the old Japan, with various events triggered by the squares you land on. Work together with other players to defeat yokai, and aim for the jackpot. As you progress in the game, you can enhance your abilities with various upgrades.

name: Berserk B.I.T.S
description:
Train and level up your B.I.T.S (Battle.Intelligent.Teammate.System). Team up with your digital buddy collect battle chips and take on the internet. Battle viruses explore new biomes and defeat powerful bosses!

Berserk B.I.T.S is an idle-rpg, auto-battler, chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop alongside your other applications. Re-position the game so you can comfortably work and monitor the progress of your B.I.T or minimize it completely and let it go in the background!

Collect and craft a plethora of battle chips to be used in real-time during battle. Each battle chip is placed in an ever growing library that you can strive to fill out. Get medals for completing tasks or kick back and spend time decorating your perfect HOME NET.

Level up your B.I.T by dropping them on a mission and taking on the internet, exploring different biomes! Be involved and monitor their battles and use battle chips you've collected in real time and help your B.I.T succeed - or sit back and relax, work on other tasks while you send your B.I.T to handle business!

name: The Legend of the Blue Sword
description: The evil necromancer has taken over the Castle. As the heroic warrior of this land, it is your task to slay this foul sorcerer and banish him from this realm once and for all.

name: Goku
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Pyramid
description: Sin descripción

description: I Will: The Story of London is an educational graphic adventure game based around full-motion video presentations on both the history of the British city of London and its various scenic points of interest.

description: Manage your supermarket in siMarket! Purchase products, stock shelves, serve customers, hire staff, and expand your store. Can you turn your small shop into a retail empire?
