name: GB Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Jr.
description: A pachi-slot game released for the Nintendo Gameboy by Sammy.

name: HolySpirit
description: Holyspirit is a 2D isometric hack'n'slash game. A hack'n'Slash is an action role playing game, like Diablo. You play a Holyspirit, which is an old corrupted soul who has been enlisted in God's army. You must liberate the country from the evil who has been unleashed against the living ones. The game is developped in C++, with the SFML. Official demo announced for 2011.

name: Genshin Impact: Summertide Scales and Tales
description:
Version 4.8 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Emilie
• New limited-time area: Simulanka
• New story quest for Emilie
• New outfits for Nilou and Kirara
• New quality of life features
• New main event: Summertide Scales and Tales
• …and more!

name: Sunes Party
description: It's time to arrange a party, Sune thinks as he lies on the bed and thinks. But he can't put together it himself. So you must help him.

name: Last Epoch: Harbingers of Ruin
description:
The Harbingers of Ruin update comes to Last Epoch.

Join us as the fight for Eterra continues with the launch of Cycle 1.1 - Harbingers of Ruin.

name: Bad Omens: 8th Apartment
description: You play as a student named Lisa, who has just moved in with her university friend. But instead of a carefree student life, Lisa faces events full of despair and fear when she is left alone in her apartment number 8...

name: Minivader
description: A simplified Space Invaders game featuring unique rounds. This game was made due to laws mandating that arcade cabinets be shipped with games, and was thus made to minimize costs. The enemies do not fire back, there is no scoring system, and the game has no sound.

name: Yomo
description:
Yomo is an oldskool-styled shoot 'em up by Aaron Fothergill for Mandarin Software. It was runner-up in The 1989 Games Writer Of The Year Award competition which is pretty cool. I've had this on my bucket list for a while because I always admired its 8-bit feel which reminded me of games I played as a youngster back in the early 80s.

The world is viewed two-dimensionally with a landscape populated by many destructible buildings and whacky vehicles which use the most frustrating mechanics. Our character is a tiny stickman who's on a mission to recover a dodgy nuke dropped behind enemy lines. However, this won't be easy because the baddies are constantly attacking so why not fire off a few heat-seeking missiles before jumping inside something probably stolen from the 1960s? On foot isn't fun, but if you see other stickmen wobbling across your screen then hit fire and gun 'em down!!

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Hot Seat
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Hot Seat is a mobile game based on the Australian version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? for iOS. The game features a single player mode and 3 multiplayer modes, including online play and local play.

developers.name: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Noite de Bingo: Fofoca com Vampiro
description: A bingo simulator with a vampire theme.

name: Mondo Reico
description: Sin descripción

name: FelisBelus
description: A funny game to represent our pet cats and keep a record and memory of them forever.

name: Moscoleta
description: A frog "clicker".

name: Sapo & Watch
description: Sin descripción

name: Jet Ace
description: Blitz your way through 13 fast paced challenging missions as you try to destroy and out manoeuvre the enemy. You will need cunning and fast reactions to avoid the gunfire and missile attacks as you mount a daring counter attack.

name: The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor
description:
The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor is an award-winning interactive horror from Stefan Vogt, the acclaimed author of Hibernated and The Curse of Rabenstein.

Take on the role of novelist Thomas King and his wife Cora as they move into a remote Scottish manor house, just days before Christmas 1986. Seeking inspiration for his next book, Thomas begins to explore the history of Blackwood Manor, only to uncover a dark secret that dates back centuries to the days of the Great Scottish Witch Hunts.

The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor is a complex interactive fiction piece written in Infocom's advanced Z-machine format XZIP. The game has three different endings, a bad, a neutral and a good ending, depending on the player's choices. It is very likely that the player, on a first playthrough, will not reach the good ending, even though it is possible. Reaching the bad or neutral ending first is part of the experience and helps the player understanding the true intentions of some of the NPCs and the impact of decisions made, so they may be reconsidered.

name: BelisBelus
description: A fighting game based entirely on pinching your opponent.

name: Ritmais
description: Sin descripción

name: Plants vs. SiIvaGunner
description: Plants vs SiIvaGunner is a browser game developed by Sierpinski Simon. The game is a version of the games Plants vs Zombies based around running jokes from the YouTube channel SiIvaGunner. The game was made as a fan contribution to The SiIvaGunner 7th Anniversary Art Gallery.

name: The Crossword
description: The Crossword is a browser game playable on The New York Times website. The features daily crossword puzzles.

name: Battle Robots: Confrontation
description: Battle Robots: Confrontation is an online PvP shooter in a sci-fi setting. Construct, upgrade and customise your robots, squad up with other pilots and unleash your power in epic battles on maps with many tactical options!

name: Quick Hit Slots
description: Quick Hit Casino is ready to hit the town and give you hours of fun with major wins! If you love real casinos with endless slots and prizes, Quick Hit slots will hit it off! Install Quick Hit casino slots game and enjoy a whole new Vegas experience! The new version of our app enables you to enjoy the best casino slots with a brand-new look, and the same passion for authentic slot machines. Your favorite famous slot machine games made it all the way from the heart of Vegas to your phone. Discover the best slots of Vegas and leading casino games that are a hit with players everywhere. Quick Hit offers a variety of Ultimate Fire Link and Fireball slots. Free casino games turn every boring evening into a night on the casino floor with classic slots in our online casino!

name: Black State
description: A secret group of scientists called the Architects summons you for a mysterious mission. Save the captives and uncover the truth behind a cataclysmic event. But none of you know what's behind the doors. Are you ready to open them?

name: Darum
description: Sin descripción

name: 7imit5
description: A RPGMaker Surreal Horror Game.

name: Night Machine
description: Dive into the lunar core in Night Machine, a 3D sci-fi deckbuilding roguelike. Pilot humanity's last hope—a lone spacecraft—against an ancient threat. Build your deck, upgrade ship systems, and navigate shifting dangers in real-time combat. Can you disable the doomsday factory before it's too late?

name: NBA 2K25
description: Stack wins, raise banners, and make history in NBA 2K25. Command every court with authenticity and realism Powered by ProPLAY, giving you ultimate control over how you play in NBA 2K25. Define your legacy in MyCAREER, MyTEAM, MyNBA, and The W.

name: Sorcero
description: In Sorcero, your goal is to command thousands of units into epic battles while supporting them with powerful spells cast from your mage tower. The game features both a campaign mode and a skirmish mode. In the campaign, players will face a series of challenging skirmishes, upgrading and choosing their spells and units between battles to prepare for the next encounter.

name: East Wood Carnival
description: A PSX retro horror game made by a sixth grader. Your car runs out of gas on your way to an abandoned carnival now infested with danger at every corner.

name: Jeanne d'Arc
description: Experience Jeanne d’Arc, originally released on the PSP, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters. Enter the 15th century, as France and England battle during the Hundred Years’ War. A mysterious and powerful armlet appears on the wrist of a young crusader named Jeanne. Commanded by an oracle from above, Jeanne wields the armlet to turn back the dark invading army to save her homeland once and for all.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters
description:
A port of Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters, originally released on the PSP, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The story is about Ratchet and Clank as they are interrupted from their vacation to search for a kidnapped girl and encounter a forgotten race known as the Technomites.

name: Watch Dogs 2: San Francisco Edition
description:
Watch Dogs 2 San Francisco Edition Includes:
The Game
Lithographies
24cm Marcus Figure
Map of San Francisco
SF-Themed Laptop Stickers
Exclusive Collector's Box
Use hacking as a weapon in the massive & dynamic open world of Watch Dogs 2.

name: Fishlike
description: High speed microgames involving fish, fishing, and fishlike activities.

name: The Test of Insanity
description: Ever argued with a squirrel? Welcome to The Test of Insanity by Big Nuts! Dive into twisted puzzles, quirky quizzes, and bizarre mini-games. It's not just a game; it's a brain-bending adventure. Think you can outsmart the madness? There's only one way to find out. Play now and embrace the insanity!!

name: Alessia's Dollhouse
description: Alessia's Dollhouse is a first-person psychological horror game that will take your breath away. In the dead of night, on a deserted road, you take on the role of Darren, an ordinary pizza delivery guy, in a creepy dollhouse filled with sinister secrets. But this time, your delivery address will drag you into an unimaginable vortex of horror.

name: Type To Report
description: This is an I'm on observation duty fangame where you need type the location of where the anomaly is to fix anomalies.

name: Star Fox
description: Star Fox (unofficial title), sometimes referred as Star Fox VB, is a game, presumably part of the Star Fox series, which was shown at CES and E3 in 1995 by Nintendo as a way to promote the Virtual Boy. It was a spaceship demo in a black background, very similar to an Arwing, and it wasn't playable. No official title has ever been given to the game.

name: Creator
description: A game/creation tool by Software Creations, shown at Space World 1995 as one of the first Nintendo 64 games. At first, it didn't have any relation to Nintendo's IPs. But it was cancelled in its original form and became the basis of what would later become Mario Paint 64, later Mario Artist: Paint Studio.

name: Wave Race 64
description: Wave Race 64 was first shown by Nintendo at the Shoshinkai 1995. In this event, the game had a completely different concept of futuristic transformable motor boats on the water, which was very different from the first game in the series, Wave Race for the Game Boy. Later, at E3 1996, the game had been changed for the usual human players with jet skis.

name: Delve into Pawssion
description:
Delve into Pawssion is a NSFW Adventure/RPG combined with mild Visual Novel mechanics, such as building up affection with characters, completing their quests, making choices that can alter some scenes, and rewards or reactions from characters.

This game is heavily based on rewarding the player with NSFW art.

name: Legend of John: Lingering Blood
description:
This project hack is short comedy/epic that will be a prequel to John’s true journey as a legendary hero.
Story is just comedy mostly but there is hints of the themes and TRUE STORY TO COME!!!

name: Double Dragon Revive
description: Double Dragon Revive faithfully reproduces the thrill of old school side-scrolling action games, with updated controls and difficulty settings for the modern era, and utilizing Arc System Works’ fighting game development experience. Jimmy Lee, Billy Lee, Roper, Abobo, and more will appear in stylish 3D.

name: Emio: The Smiling Man - Famicom Detective Club
description:
Explore an interactive drama full of interesting characters

Continue the adventures of the Utsugi Detective Agency with the return of familiar characters—including the returning protagonist from previous games, and Ayumi Tachibana, who is now playable in certain sections of the game for the first time in the series!

Playing as the investigative duo, you’ll need to learn a lot about the personalities and backstories of the other characters if you want to discover the truth. Who is harmless, and who is keeping important secrets? Ask questions, reference your notes, and make connections—you’ll have to order your thoughts and examine your leads carefully to draw the right conclusions.

name: The Key of Avalon
description:
Avalon no Kagi, alternatively known as The Key of Avalon is an arcade game developed by Hitmaker and published by Sega on the Triforce arcade board. It is the third card arcade game by Sega. It is a combination of sugoroku style board game and combat trading card game.

It was often compared to Culdcept, and is able to be played by multiple players at once, using a free in and free out method where other players can drop in and drop out of a match at any time. The cabinet reads a deck of up to 30 cards.

Sega Logistics Service announced it would end service on the machines on March 31, 2017.

name: Astoria: Fate's Kiss
description: Just one kiss will change the fate of Olympus forever.

name: Deltarune: Frozen Heart
description: The end of the Snowgrave Route seen from another place. While Kris gets torn to pieces by a bootleg Mettaton NEO, Susie have to face Noelle, lost in the trance of the Thorn Ring, before she freezes her to death! And who knows, maybe the situation can get even worse than that?

name: Barcode Battler
description: Sin descripción

name: Onekey
description: Using only one key to activate scenery, guide the tribesman to safety.

name: Barcode Battler
description: The second model of the Barcode Battler, known as Barcode Battler II in Japan.

name: Mallet Mania
description: Multiplayer mallet mayhem in this twisty, topsy turvy sports game.

name: Goober Shot
description: Goober Shot is a 2d browser supported game created by Winter Pixel, the creators of hit game, Goober Dash. In this game, you must compete against other players (goobers) to complete the match objective. There are multiple possible modes, such as 'Balloon Pop' and 'Deathmatch.' Be the first to get 5 points to win, and even earn cosmetics.

name: Cold Shuulathoi
description:
Cold Shuulathoi is an unofficial mod for Doom II.

Doomguy is sent to an Arctic part of Mars to stop the summoning of a demon called the Shuulathoi. The base looks gothic, and some monsters have taken it over.

name: Digital Dreams
description: Digital Dreams is a acid fueled trip into the digital realm, an assault on your senses, and a dive into an alternate reality. A set of 8 maps, mostly around the micro-slaugter/lock in fight framework, but not shy of Tyson designs or platforming only maps.

name: Monuments
description: Three monumental maps (big, bigger, biggest), at least one secret map and a cosy grove to hang out in after completing the final map. The maps are﻿ combat-heavy ﻿and cont﻿ain elements of slaughter,﻿ ﻿﻿but the en﻿emy counts are n﻿o﻿t out of this world and t﻿h﻿e combat is varied in style and intensity.

name: Paint it Doom
description:
Paint it Doom is a conceptual successor to DIY, in that both are made out of solid colors. The sprites aren't crunched in this one though.

The wad is divided into 2 episodes:
Liberal Arts - which is a mainline progression consisting of 19 maps. Some of the later maps are pretty slaughtery.
Radicalized Arts - which is 3 misfit maps that couldn't be reconciled with my vision.

name: Parallel Doomensions
description: DoomWorld community project of 28 Quake 1 styled maps with bespoken music credits by John S. Weekley and Josie Bullock.

name: Plutonic Visions
description: Plutonic Visions is a 22 map wad for The Plutonia Experiment. Features mostly very short, action packed maps inspired by Plutonia's first two episodes, with some longer ones inspired by the final third sprinkled in for good measure.

name: Stone Flower
description: Five Boom-compatible maps based around an earthy, green-and-brown texture theme, and design mostly inspired by Ribbiks' earlier work. Starts with tiny sandbox maps in MAP01 and 02, ramps up the difficulty with combat﻿-puzzle stuff in MAP03 and 04 and builds up to a slaughter finale in MAP05.

name: Voyager EP
description: Voyager EP is a single-player/co-op WAD containing five adventurous, space-themed maps, offering a wide range of gameplay experiences ranging from fierce action to gentle exploration. Each map took direct inspiration from one of the five tracks featured on Tristan Clark's Voyager EP, released in 2021. This mapset was created to show our appreciation for @Tristan and his extremely respectable body of work, musical and otherwise, and additionally to commemorate his 27th birthday this July!

name: Scatterpaws
description: You haven't been fed in at least two seconds! Get your owners attention by destroying their belongings until you're fed!

name: Shift 87
description:
Shift 87 is a first person observation horror game.
Keen investigators can find a total of 66 anomalies throughout 3 levels of handcrafted, highly atmospheric environments.

Runs are randomly generated, featuring small and subtle as well as horrifying and unmissable anomalies to provide a gameplay experience that is uniquely different and exciting each time. Players can expect a playtime of around 2-3 hours for a full playthrough.

name: OK! Puzzle Stars
description:
Inspired by the British celebrity magazine franchise 'OK!', 'OK! Puzzle Stars' puts the player as the role of an Editor in Chief, who must solve a variety of puzzles in order to send 12 OK! magazines to the shops.

The game mainly utilises the Nintendo DS stylus for gameplay and includes puzzles like Wordsearches, Crosswords, Sudoku, Fitword and so on. The player is required to hold the Nintendo DS console sideways in order to play the game. The Start button is also used to pause a puzzle at any time and brings up the Pause Menu (which includes options to continue the puzzle, teach handwriting recognition to suit the player's handwriting mode, or to quit the puzzle).

Every issue in the game includes 16 puzzles to solve and for every 4 solved, the player must then solve a special puzzle called a 'Puzzle Star' (which rewards the player a cover item for the current issue). When all 4 cover item elements are achieved for one issue, the player moves onto the next until all 12 are complete.

For every puzzle complete, the player is awarded an OK! Scratch Card. Here players must use the Nintendo DS stylus to rub one out of 3 stars shown to win a certain number of Stars (which allow players to purchase hints in a difficult situation).

The game includes a variety of famous celebrity photographs throughout Bonus Puzzles (as well as the issue covers) and displays fascinating celebrity facts during the saving processes.

name: Rubik's Match
description: Spin, solve, and evolve in this match-3 game - fun twist on the classic.

name: Retail Company Simulator
description: Run your retail company in this free prologue version of the game. Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products, meet customer needs, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Hire new workers, expand your store, and enjoy the growth of your retail company.

name: Mugen Rinne no Irregular
description:
A new story from the point of view of "Usami Sumireko".
In this original story, she joins the inhabitants of Gensoukyou to fight against the evil spirit "Mima" that has suddenly appeared!
Experience an unknown adventure you've never seen before!

name: Les Guignols de l'info… le jeu !
description: Les Guignols De L'Info...Le Jeu ! is a point-and-click game based on a French satirical TV program. You play as a new TV reporter who has just joined the WCI, an information channel. Your goal is to get the best scoop from famous people from various fields such as sports, politics, and movies. Your ultimate aim is to replace the main presenter, PPDA. The game does not have an inventory system; instead, you are equipped with a video camera that has a limited battery. You must record pictures and/or sounds that align with your mission briefing, but you have to make choices quickly as there are many characters to interact with and a time limit. The game occasionally includes puzzle elements, such as creating a "portrait robot" or selecting the right dialogue.

name: World Crafter TD
description:
A highly addictive survival crafting tower defense game!
Gather, craft, build turrets, shoot guns, and expand the land to defend against waves of enemies in World Crafter TD!

name: Step by Little Step
description:
Bring your cat back to the world of the living.
The rules are simple, as they are familiar:
Do not look back.
and everything will be just the way it was before.

name: Planet Coaster 2
description: Dive into the thrilling world of Planet Coaster 2! Construct the theme park of your dreams with an intuitive piece-by-piece building system, as you meticulously craft and customise every aspect of your park down to the smallest detail. From towering rollercoasters to spectacular twisting water slides, let your imagination reach new heights to delight and thrill your guests.

name: Pokémon Hidden Place
description: A Pokémon fangame.

name: Fontemon
description: Fontemon is a Pokémon parody, made with a game engine inside a font. This means the game runs wherever you can install and choose a font. The game is structured akin to a "choose your own adventure".

name: Dinomod Enhanced
description:
An update to the original Dinomod, Dinomod Enhanced is a continuation of the project, with new enhancements after added after the original project stopped being updated.

Dinomod Enhanced is the most up-to-date enhancement mod for Dinosaur Planet, and it is distributed standalone or via DinoLauncher.

name: Stress
description: Survival horror adventure game with rpg elements, set on dystopian town under a zombie outbreak of unknown origin. The player must investigate, solve puzzles and fight zombies to survive and uncover the truth behind the disaster. Gather weapons and resources to defend yourself from the "returned" and avoid getting infected and suffering of 'stress', which will accelerate the infection.

name: Higashio Osamu Kanshuu: Pro Yakyuu Stadium '91
description: Higashio Osamu Kanshuu Pro Yakyuu Stadium '91 is a Sports game, published by Tokuma Shoten, which was released on the Game Boy in Japan in 1991.

name: Doraemon no Study Boy 3: Ku Ku Master
description: Doraemon no Study Boy 3: Ku Ku Master is an edutainment game, developed and published by Fujicom, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: The Lost Treasures of Infocom II
description:
The Lost Treasures of Infocom II is a collection of text adventure games from interactive fiction pioneer Infocom, published by Activision in 1992. It was available for MS-DOS and Apple Macintosh, and also as a cross-platform expanded CD-ROM version. This follow-up compilation was released following the commercial success of their previous collection, The Lost Treasures of Infocom, which contained 20 of Infocom's most popular games.

The 11 games included in all versions are:

A Mind Forever Voyaging
Border Zone
Bureaucracy
Cutthroats
Hollywood Hijinx
Nord and Bert Couldn't Make Head or Tail of It
Plundered Hearts
Seastalker
Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels
Trinity
Wishbringer

The CD-ROM version included three additional games:

Arthur: The Quest for Excalibur
James Clavell's Shōgun
Journey

The package contains an instruction manual reprinting all of the games' manuals, as well as a few pack-in items from Sherlock and Trinity. However, it leaves out the InvisiClues hint booklets from the original games, replacing them instead with a card advertising a pay-per-minute hint line. The package also includes a coupon for the game Leather Goddesses of Phobos, which had not been included in either of the two collections.

The CD-ROM version includes an instruction manual with instructions for all three games, the Book of Hours pack-in from Arthur, and the maps from Journey and Shōgun.

name: Subspace Continuum
description: Subspace Continuum is a player-maintained online shoot ‘em up game enjoyed by people from all around the world - many of whom remain addicted to the fast paced explosive battles! Gameplay is extremely competitive and there are cup leagues, tournaments, cash prize events, a variety of team & squad based competitions. This completely free game also has a pretty interesting player community with its own history which is so in-depth that books could probably be written about it!

name: Quetzal
description: Quetzal is the ultimate indie deck builder based on Aztec mythology.

name: Vanity Fair: The Pursuit
description: Players follow Lu Yuan through important stages of his life and experience his growth trajectory from youth to maturity. It will take you to relive those decisions that you have never tried to make in reality, and feel the different life brought about by each choice.

name: Late Night at the KWL
description:
Years ago, I worked for a radio station. The KWL.

Strange place.
It didn't run any songs, or interviews, or news. Just stories. Any genre. Any length. So long as it was original.
I was one of the two people in charge of writing them.

We worked nights to have everything ready for the morning recording.

I still remember the night I decided to quit.

name: Cilla
description:
Cilla is a dynamic 2D side-scrolling shooter that immerses players into the complex narrative of humanity's evolution and the endless struggle for survival at any cost.

You will acquaint themselves with Cilla - a mysterious entity thrust into the heart of war. She is the Perfect Soldier. Devoid of pain, fear, and remorse. Her journey intertwines with the harsh present and what seems to be an inevitable future, as endless losses and extraterrestrial threats pursue her at every turn. But what will happen when Cilla faces her most challenging trial - a choice that will change everything?

Game Features:

Narrative Twist: Immerse yourself in the story of the Perfect Soldier in an alternate future universe. Experience her emotions and confront a moral choice that will impact Cilla's fate and that of all humanity.

Beautiful Pixel Graphics: Enjoy handcrafted game landscapes, meticulously designed multi-layered backgrounds, and unique enemies in each level.

Challenging and Dynamic Combat: Demonstrate maximum agility, collect bonuses, evade enemy fire, and study their behavior and attacks throughout the gripping story of the game.

Take up the challenge and determine the fate of the world!

name: Super Missile Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: An Other Golf Game
description:
An Other Golf Game is not your typical openish world sandbox life-sim survival golf game experience featuring permadeath. Finally, now you can suck at golf virtually as much as you suck in real life.

You'll learn the art of golf on your own terms: picking clubs, assessing the wind, and, of course, tracking down that stray ball no matter where it lands. It’s a game for those who want to discover, adapt, and make every inch of progress on their own.

Beyond the golf course, life goes on—literally. You're living out entire days, where golfing may or may not be part of it, it's entirely up to you. You’ll have to keep yourself alive, managing food, water, and sleep while earning enough cash through odd jobs to keep your golfing dream alive.

It’s a game that tests patience, resourcefulness, and adaptability. If you’re willing to roll with the quirks, laugh off the Early Access growing pains, you might just discover an experience that’s both unexpectedly rewarding and thoroughly unconventional.

Welcome to An Other Golf Game. Good luck out there, and happy golfing… if you can survive long enough to get to it!

name: Fire Emblem: Reincarnation of Light and Darkness
description: An unlicensed Fire Emblem game using many assets from other Fire Emblem games. An alternative bootleg exists using Langrisser characters in the same game.

name: State of Presence
description: State of Presence is a point-and-click visual novel that toys with the concept of existence and physicality. Players will delve into the afterlife of Kacper Takarski as he copes with his untimely death and the new environment he's found himself in. Exploring an unfamiliar city, Kacper must string together the remnants of his past in order to understand what became of him.

name: Hard Drivin'
description: A cancelled NES version of the arcade game that eschews real-time 3D in favor of prerendered graphics and 2.5D visuals.

name: Sunky the PC Port
description: An awesome parody of SONIC-PC (by JoeDoughBoi and John-Kun) in which Sunky needs to invite 1 more friend to start a DANCE PARTY!

name: 2Kaizo 2Learn

name: Fit Music
description:
Exercise and music go together like aerobics and sweatbands! Whether you prefer to tackle rhythm-driven fitness routines or listen to your favourite tracks while you power through your workout sets, you'll get a combination of both with this title. Fit Music is a unique workout game for Wii where different fitness combinations are explored and tailored to suit your needs. Right at the start you'll undergo a physical analysis, which will let you know your current physical condition and help you set the goals you want to achieve. Fun and easy to play - just follow the on-screen character movements and you're ready to start on the road to fitness!

The Fit Music routines have been conceived by European fitness champion Patrizia Salviato, a pro coach who will be your in-game instructor. The game features two energetic modes - a fun Fit Dance mode that has you move your body and work out along to the music of 15 international dance hits, as well as a substantial Training mode consisting of a wide variety of dynamic exercise programmes. These are based on your physical condition, as determined by data gathered when first creating your game profile. There are different levels to suit your current fitness condition, and of course the higher the level you do, the harder the workout will be!

It introduces new gameplay mechanics, such as improved combat and altered enemy placements. The mod also adds new items, weapons, and spells while rebalancing existing content to create a more challenging and refined experience.

name: Undertale Green
description: Undertale Green is a Fangame project where you follows the fifth human, Olive, the soul of kindness through their journey into the underground, in order to find the king of monsterkind. But will they makes friend on the road ? it's up to you to decide their fate, in brand new areas, and with brand new monsters to discover!

name: Mega Man Sunrise
description: A Gameboy Mega Man inspired fangame. After Dr. Light created a new highly intelligent robot by the name of "Trance", Dr. Wily manages to kidnap her and reprogram her for his evil purposes. It's up to Mega Man to once again put a stop to Dr Wily's evil scheme and bring back Trance to reason.

name: ADOM: Ancient Domains of Mystery
description:
ADOM is an epic fantasy roguelike designed and developed by Thomas Biskup and first released in 1994. The story takes you to the Drakalor Chain, a mountainous area in the fictional land of Ancardia. You play as an adventurer who sets out to defend the world from the Coming of Chaos, as told by an ancient prophecy.

ADOM offers many areas to explore, as well as multiple story-driven quests and endings. While the early versions were limited to ASCII graphics, later versions added tile-based graphics, music, sound, and an overworld map.

name: Finding Buddies
description: Daniel has just started his adult life. Despite his sad past, he managed to move on and re-socialize. So many responsibilities are coming and it is up to you to decide how he will handle all of this. The great thing is that maybe you can find some cute guys along your path

name: Tube Noodles
description:
Last night you tried this new "tube noodles" stuff for dinner. It tasted just... ok.

Now, why is your stomach speaking to you? And why does it keep telling you to EAT?

name: Full Throttle
description: 3rd-person racing game

name: House of Torment
description:
Experience the chilling terror of "House of Torment," a gripping horror game where you, Andrew Carter, wake up lost in a dark forest with no memory of how you arrived and only a flashlight to guide you. Desperate for shelter, you stumble upon a mysterious house. Inside, you must uncover the dark secrets of its infamous owner, the renowned streamer Asmongold.

Navigate eerie rooms, solve intricate puzzles, and avoid terrifying encounters, as you are not a fighter. Survival depends on your wits and stealth. With stunning graphics and immersive sound design, your journey through the House of Torment will be a spine-chilling experience.

Can you unravel the mysteries and escape the house? Download now and face your fears.

name: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition
description: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition (STFBHE) is the continuation of Sonic the Fighters Blitz (STFB), a 2D re-imagining of the arcade game Sonic The Fighters created by Restless Dipstick. STFBHE aims to rebalance and expand upon the original STFB.

name: The Last Goodbye
description: In the shadowy fairy tale metropolis of Prava, the world-weary gun-for-hire Lucille - better known on the streets as The Banshee - takes a job from enigmatic entrepreneur Ark McLean. Her target: Bullseye, the deadliest gangster in town. On her travels through the criminal underworld she meets all manner of friends and foes, with plenty of action and intrigue along the way.

name: Ferral Quest
description:
Open world. With different biomes: forest, jungle, desert, wasteland snowy, volcanic. In addition to dozens of dungeons to explore and hidden secrets.
Open world PVE missions, special dungeons.
Raid Bosses and Wanderers to hunt scattered around the world.
Progression from Tier 0 to Tier 10.
Develop your skill tree to make your character unique.
Different buffs and equipment so you can forge your strategy in battle.
Get the best equipment by destroying big bosses in their dungeons.

name: Dooming The Bar
description:
Dooming The Bar is a project centered on bringing the Half-Life 2 beta's City 17 into Doom, composed of a fully playable 8-map journey from the Industrial sector through to Kleiner's lab as per 2001 and 2002 concepts, plus two bonus maps.

You'll see famous landmarks like the Stenographer's Chasm, Terminal Plaza (with pendulum script!), Consulcast, Manhack Arcade (both versions!) and more on your travels.

name: Hello Kitty Mahjong
description: Challenge your mind by solving the Hello Kitty puzzle! Can you find all the matching tiles before time runs out?

name: Peacely Online
description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Peacely Online, a captivating 2D top-down pixel art MMORPG. Enter the peaceful world of Peacely, a realm without ego,

Explore diverse maps, complete thrilling quests, and battle fearsome monsters to progress through the game. Collect gear and items from loot drops and customize your character.

Start your journey in Peacely Ville, where you have a cozy home to return to and numerous NPCs to interact with. Alongside loyal pets that aid in your battles and a vibrant community of players to chat with, Peacely Online promises an immersive and enjoyable gaming experience.

name: Virtual Firearm Simulations
description: Virtual Firearm Simulations is a low-poly gun building simulator with over 40 accurately modeled weapons.

name: Punishing Gray Raven
description: Punishing Gray Raven is an action RPG set in a dystopian future where humanity battles extinction from the Punishing Virus. Players lead the Gray Raven, a team of elite cyborgs, in reclaiming their world through fast-paced combat and strategic team building. Inspired by anime aesthetics, the game blends real-time action with deep narrative exploration of identity and survival, where players strategically command a diverse roster of characters with unique abilities to overcome challenges and enemies.

name: AI Senshi Neuro-sama
description: A 2D "beat'em up" fan game based on the Neuro-sama universe with hand-drawn graphics and animation, made in 2024 by a solo developer Azzypics.

name: Persona 4 GB
description:
EXPERIENCE THE HIT CLASSIC JRPG SERIES NOW ON THE GAMEBOY!

Ever wonder what Persona 4 would look like if it was released on the gameboy? Well now you don't need to, as a reimagining of what a gameboy Persona 4 might be like comes to reality and on actual hardware with a rom file.

name: Atelier Marie Plus: The Alchemist of Salburg
description:
A remastered version of the original Atelier Marie Plus, released with the Digital Deluxe Upgrade Pack with upgrade graphics and, for the first time, worldwide.
It is accessible from the Atelier Marie Remake main menu.

name: Was God Birthed!?
description: Explore a lush, liminal museum with surreal suprises at every turn as you avoid your dad with your wits and scooter, and make it downstairs in time to catch the Club Ruby Rave!

name: Blow'em Out
description:
Do you think blowing out candles on your birthday cake is easy? What if the flames come to life and start chasing you while trying to put out all the candles?

Blow'em Out is an addicting arcade style game that isn't a cakewalk. Make your way through 10 stages to get the Happy Birthday you deserve!

Koi Dojo - a game that turns water conservation into a fun-filled adventure. Race against the odds to protect our precious freshwater resources.

Join the community of eco-conscious gamers, and make a splash in mobile gaming while championing a crucial cause. Let's prove that protecting our planet's freshwater can be both fun and rewarding. Dive into a refreshing gaming experience that's making waves in eco-awareness!

name: AI Mahjong 2000
description: Ai Mahjong 2000 is a mahjong game that features 3 different kind of board background colours and different opponent difficulty levels.

name: The Case Book of Arne: Interlude
description:
Get a taste of Lynn and Arne's everyday life between cases!
There's a lot more to Lynn's life in the other world than you see in the main story!
Take the curious events at the Lugenberg Festival...
Unravel a new mystery in this Interlude chapter,
which takes place between Cases 1 and 2.

name: WhereHurt
description: Immerse yourself in WhereHurt, a psycho-horror game where reality and nightmare collide. Navigate your home, city, and workplace, racing against time to escape inner demons and societal mental barriers. Can you solve the puzzles and confront your fears, or will you be lost forever?

name: Untitled Instagram Easter Egg
description: An untitled game which is an Easter egg found on Instagram's Direct Messages. By touching an emoji, a screen with a single Pong-style game opens up. The player is intended to use a paddle to prevent the ball (the emoji which was clicked on) to fall below the screen). Some emojis have different behavior, changing according to the amount of points scored.

name: Souvenirs
description: Explore a house in search of Leonardo's memories. Souvenirs is a merge like strategy game, created by a tiny independent French studio.

name: Son and Bone
description: Son and Bone is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you take on the role of Sam Judge, a Sheriff, that after tracking down a notorious bandit who attacked a farm and kidnapped a local, has found himself on an alien world overrun by prehistoric creatures and dinosaurs.

name: Cluminati
description: Test your linguistic skills in Cluminati, a puzzle word game where you decipher clues to unlock passwords and join a secret society. Use your wits while racing against time to advance through 13 challenging rounds of initiation.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character Pass
description:
The Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character Pass includes 4 characters as they are released, Outfit 1 colors 3-10 for those characters and 4200 drive tickets.

The characters included are M. Bison, Terry, Mai and Elena.
Terry and Mai from Fatal Fury will be the first guest characters to appear in the main Street Fighter series.
